title: AI doesn’t fix measurement — it raises the stakes for CMOs

title: The case for in-flight advertising for audience engagement and retargeting
summary: Between struggling to be remembered in a sea of ads overwhelming consumers and guaranteeing actual people see an ad, many advertisers continue to battle with ad fatigue, low recall, fraud and more. However, one environment has proved a standout: in-flight advertising....

title: A I-designed proteins may help spot cancer
summary: Researchers at MIT and Microsoft have used artificial intelligence to create molecular sensors that could detect early signs of cancer via a urine test. The researchers developed an AI model to design short proteins that are targeted by enzymes called proteases, which are...
